english.segment1: Here i stand. Before you my heart is still. Wanting just to be with you. Waiting here. Long for your voice to speak. Touch me now. Its your face i seek
english.segment2: How my soul longs for you. To be with you. Adore you. Nothing more i want to do. Than to sing to you
english.segment3: Jesus im in love with you. Speak to me. Whisper you words of truth. Take my heart. Won't you make me new. Jesus, how i love you. How i love you
english.segment4: On my knees. Before you i lay my life. Giving all. A living sacrifice. Take my life. And all that i long to be. Set apart. Only for you my king
english.segment5: How my soul longs for you. To be with you. Adore you. Nothing more i want to do. Than to sing to you
english.segment6: Jesus im in love with you. Speak to me. Whisper your words of truth. Take my heart. Won't you make me new. Jesus, how i love you. How i love you
english.segment7: How my soul longs for you. How my soul longs for you. How my soul longs for you. How my soul longs for you
